changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_client ( client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (client_id));

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_client_login ( client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, login VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (client_id), FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES t_client (client_id));

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_product ( product_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, duration_in_month INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (product_id));

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_product_loan ( fk_product_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, loan_rate DECIMAL(3,2) NOT NULL, max_sum DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (fk_product_id), FOREIGN KEY (fk_product_id) REFERENCES t_product (product_id));

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_product_deposit ( fk_product_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, deposit_rate DECIMAL(3,2) NOT NULL, min_sum DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (fk_product_id), FOREIGN KEY (fk_product_id) REFERENCES t_product (product_id));

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE t_client_product ( client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, product_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, KEY fk_client_id (client_id), KEY fk_product_id (product_id), CONSTRAINT fk_client_id FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES t_client (client_id), CONSTRAINT fk_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES t_product (product_id) );

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_account ( account_iban VARCHAR(34) NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL, currency_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, opening_date DATE NOT NULL, product_id VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (account_iban), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES t_product (product_id));

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_card ( card_number VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, account_iban VARCHAR(34), PRIMARY KEY (card_number), FOREIGN KEY (account_iban) REFERENCES t_account (account_iban));

changeSet.author: abulgarin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_transaction ( transaction_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sum DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, sender_account_iban VARCHAR(34) NOT NULL, recipient_account_iban VARCHAR(34) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id), FOREIGN KEY (sender_account_iban) REFERENCES t_account (account_iban), FOREIGN KEY (recipient_account_iban) REFERENCES t_account (account_iban));
